entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Étang 05:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: 6.0°C
Wind: ESE 74 km/h gust 107 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 140 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
